channel.title: Urm... how can I make them say that?!
channel.description:
Ok...
I have spawned (made) an NPC and I want it to say "welcome to Project Noobscape yourname" but the varible is declaired in client and putting "Welcome to Project NoobScape " + client.playerName; doesnt work??!!!
help plz, how do I do it?!
- toonshorty

item.title: Urm... how can I make them say that?!
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("NAME")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "NAME is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "NAME is OFFLINE"; } }

item.title: Urm... how can I make them say that?!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[s]LOLIRL

player.playerName

=)[/s]

NVM. Just thought about what you’re trying to do. The only way you could do it, it spawn the npcs for each player, and only show them to the corrosponding player, or make it so when they log in the NPC says it with their name.

item.title: Urm... how can I make them say that?!
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

go into npchandler. serch for like… MOO

and under it add

if (npcs[i].npcType == ID) {
						if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT TO SAY";
						}
						}
